column2: Fix memory leak of StatusBar in IdeFrameImpl

column3:
IdeFrameImpl holds a IdeRootPane that holds a StatusBar.
When disposing of the IdeFrameImpl, one needs to first dispose of
the StatusBar.
@gregsh? I'm not sure who should review this, but can someone take a look?
@SergeyMalenkov Could you please take a look?
Fix memory leak of StatusBar in IdeFrameImpl
